title: SSC 10th Board
description: I completed my SSC 10th Board in 2020 with a score of 92.40% from Veershaiva Madhyamik Vidyalaya, Nagpur.

title: HSC 12th Board
description: I completed my HSC 12th Board (Science) in 2022 with a score of 87.67% from A. R. Fule Junior College, Nagpur.

title: B.Tech
description: I am pursuing my B.Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Yeshwantrao Chavan College of Engineering, Nagpur.
